sentences.sentence: "I love his big mouth," said Mary obstinately.
sentences.translation: “我喜欢他的大嘴巴。”玛丽固执地说。

sentences.sentence: "I don't believe he does," said Mary quite obstinately.
sentences.translation: “我不相信他会这么希望。”玛丽很固执地说。

sentences.sentence: "It was the robin who showed me the way," she protested obstinately.
sentences.translation: “是知更鸟给我指路的。”她固执地反驳道。
